abstract: Advertisers like Visa are buying commercial time before, during and after Super Bowl XLV, reflecting the improvement in the economy.
snippet: Advertisers like Visa are buying commercial time before, during and after Super Bowl XLV, reflecting the improvement in the economy.
lead_paragraph: Each year, it seems that the efforts by marketers to gain attention for what they are doing on Super Bowl Sunday start earlier than the year before. It is not unlike how reporters write each year that retailers seem to be starting the Christmas shopping season earlier than the year before.

headline.main: Super Bowl Advertisers Are Super Busy
